title: The Taming of the Shrew (1929, Romance) Mary Pickford, Douglas Fairbanks | Full Movie

sources.title: The Taming of the Shrew (1929, Romance) Mary Pickford, Douglas Fairbanks | Full Movie
sources.description:
Adaptation of William Shakespeare's Play. In 16th-century Padua, Hortensio loves Bianca, but her father won't allow her to marry until his eldest, Katherine, is engaged to get married. Petruchio, seeking a wealthy match, agrees to court Katherine despite her strong-willed reputation. Despite Katherine's resistance, she has no choice but to marry him, impacting her sister's fate.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/boABdwFFyy4


Original title: The Taming of the Shrew (1929)

This film has subtitles in many languages.

Director: Sam Taylor
Writers: William Shakespeare, Sam Taylor 
Stars: Mary Pickford, Douglas Fairbanks, Edwin Maxwell
Genre:  Classics, Comedy, Romance, Pre-code, Literary
Budget: $504,000


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
00:21 Romantic comedy unfolds as friends plan marriages for wealthy suitors with challenging personalities.
15:06 A dramatic encounter between Petruchio and Kate unfolds, showcasing their fiery personalities and potential for a tumultuous relationship.
22:03 A tale of marriage, transformation, and love unfolds in a 1929 film adaptation.
38:19 A chaotic wedding feast unfolds as Petruchio asserts dominance over Kate in a comedic yet tumultuous manner.
50:07 A humorous depiction of a man's attempt to tame a spirited woman through manipulation and deception.
